title: Tirupurâ€™s Saravana upbeat with two Ricoh buys - printweek
summary: Saravana Graphics, a packaging and commercial printing specialist from Tirupur, Tamil Nadu, has invested in two Ricoh digital presses to enhance its printing capabilities. The new Ricoh Pro 8320S and Pro 7200X digital presses will allow for diverse applications in high-textured graphics and premium commercial prints. These additions aim to improve the efficiency and quality of their garment tags, premium cards, and photo album printing.
green_innovation: FALSE. The article does not mention any specific environmental benefits or sustainable practices associated with the new digital presses.
business_innovation: TRUE. The investment in new Ricoh digital presses for diverse applications in commercial printing represents a significant improvement over previous products and processes.
green_product: FALSE. The article discusses printing presses, which do not meet the criteria for being a green product as defined.

likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 323111 - Commercial Printing (except Screen and Books), 323113 - Commercial Screen Printing, 323120 - Support Activities for Printing, 339999 - All Other Miscellaneous Manufacturing.
